attributes.action: The right to stay in Buckingham Palace in exchange for our tax money
attributes.background: In exchange for our tax money to renovate Buckingham Palace we demand that UK tax payers should be able to enter a lottery to stay at the palace to see where our money went. I suggest 200 nights per year to be made available.

rejection.details: The UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for determining who can stay in Buckingham Palace.
